headlines: You don’t wear it. You awaken it.
It’s not jewelry. It’s a reflection of you.
Not made to match. Made to reveal.
Born from silence. Made to speak.
You don’t own it. You embody it.
Crafted for the soul, not the showcase.
Hero.subhead: Your birth chart, shaped into light.

Statement.title: YOUR BIRTH CHART, SHAPED INTO LIGHT.
Statement.line1: Beyond trends and seasons, there is a map written only for you.
Statement.line2: Our intelligent atelier reads your astrological chart and translates it into a protective talisman – a piece of jewellery that carries your true essence, close to your skin.

banner_1.title:
Nothing less
than pure light.
banner_1.content: Every talisman begins with uncompromising materials. We work exclusively with VVS diamonds and precious metals refined to the highest standards, each stone hand-set to reveal its full clarity and fire. Because when a piece is meant to protect you, it deserves the finest light we can find.

banner_2.title:
From a star map to
 a stone you can touch.
banner_2.content: Your birth chart is translated by our AI into shapes, lines and colours – the secret architecture of your personal talisman. Rubies, garnets or rare red stones are then chosen to embody that energy, carved and set by our artisans. What starts as an invisible pattern in the sky becomes a jewel that lives on your skin.

banner_3.title:
Nothing less
than pure light.
banner_3.content: Every talisman begins with uncompromising materials. We work exclusively with VVS diamonds and precious metals refined to the highest standards, each stone hand-set to reveal its full clarity and fire. Because when a piece is meant to protect you, it deserves the finest light we can find.

Statement.title: A JEWELLERY HOUSE WRITTEN IN YOUR STARS.
Statement.line1: TALY was created for those who want more than something beautiful to wear.
Statement.line2: We use your astrological chart as our starting point, then let technology and craftsmanshipwork together to design a talisman only you could own. Every piece is a quiet alliance between your story, your sky and our atelier.

block1.title: WE BEGIN WITH YOUR SKY, NOT A SKETCH.
lines: You share your date, time and place of birth. Our intelligent system studies the map of your planets, aspects and elements, and translates them into lines, curves and symbolic motifs.
What would normally remain an unseen pattern becomes the blueprint of your future talisman.

block2.title: AND END WITH A PIECE THAT FEELS LIKE YOU.
lines: From that digital blueprint, our artisans choose metals, VVS diamonds and rare gemstones that resonate with your chart.
Each stone is set by hand, each proportion adjusted until the piece sits effortlessly on the body. The result is not a collection item, but a personal object you grow with over time.

StatementEnd.title: JEWELLERY THAT REMEMBERS WHO YOU ARE.
StatementEnd.line1: We do not design for everyone. We design for one person at a time.
StatementEnd.line2: Your talisman is meant to walk through years with you, to witness changes, to hold the intentions you set today. In a world of endless choice, TALY is our answer to a simple question: what if your most precious piece could only belong to you?

Contact.backgroundAlt: Taly contact background with reflected diamond
Contact.title: Contact Us

intro.line1: Have a question about your talisman, your birth chart design or your Taly Studio account?
intro.line2: Our team is here to help you continue your journey with ease.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can support you...

footer.note: A member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible, usually within 1–2 business days.

Pricing.backgroundAlt: Taly pricing background with starry sky
Pricing.title: Choose your path through the Taly universe.
Pricing.subtitle: Pick the plan that matches how often you want to create new talisman stories and visuals.

first.name: First Constellation
first.tagline: Your first steps into the Taly universe.

features.item2: Access to your personal Taly Studio dashboard
features.item3: Save and revisit your favourite designs

first.note: Perfect if you're just meeting Taly Studio and want to explore a few storylines and talisman visuals before going deeper.

celestial.name: Celestial Journey
celestial.tagline: Design, refine and rediscover your talisman story.
celestial.note: For those who want room to play: experiment with multiple birth-chart stories, visual directions and stone combinations until it feels exactly like you.

infinite.name: Infinite Sky

features.item1: Unlimited AI story & jewellery image generations
features.item2: Early access to new features and styles
features.item3: Ideal for power users, studios or collectors

infinite.note: For devoted creators and collectors. Generate new talisman stories and images as you wish, while refining and growing a living galaxy of designs around your birth chart.

footer.line1: All plans include access to Taly Studio, where you can save, revisit and refine every talisman you create.
footer.line2: You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel your plan at any time as your journey with Taly evolves.

Hero.title: Privacy Policy
Hero.imageAlt: Taly Jewelry and Taly Studio privacy background

Intro.title: How we protect your constellation.
Intro.lead: This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we may collect, why we collect it, and how we protect it when you use Taly Jewelry and Taly Studio.
lines: We only collect what we need to run the service and support you.
We apply practical safeguards to protect your information.
This is a short demo version for testing. We will expand it with full details before launch.

section1.title: 1. Who we are
paragraphs: Taly Jewelry operates Taly Studio. In this policy, “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Taly Jewelry as the controller of personal data processed through our website and services.
If you have questions about this policy, you can contact us using the details provided on our website.

section2.title: 2. What information we may collect
paragraphs: Account details: such as your name and email address when you create an account or contact us.
Optional profile inputs: information you choose to provide to personalize your experience (for example, details used to generate stories or concepts).
Usage data: basic technical information like device/browser type and interactions with pages or features, used to understand performance and improve the product.

section3.title: 3. How we use your information
paragraphs: To provide and maintain the service, including authentication, saved preferences, and your requested features.
To improve stability, usability, and security, including debugging and preventing abuse.
To communicate with you about essential updates, support requests, or security-related messages.

section4.title: 4. Cookies
paragraphs: We may use cookies or similar technologies to keep the site working, maintain sessions, and remember preferences.
Where required, we will request consent before placing non-essential cookies, and you can adjust cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section5.title: 5. Sharing and third parties
paragraphs: We do not sell your personal data.

We may rely on trusted service providers (for example, hosting and infrastructure) to operate the service. They are only permitted to process data on our instructions and for the purpose of providing their services.

section6.title: 6. Data security and retention
paragraphs: We use reasonable technical and organisational measures to protect personal data against unauthorised access, loss, or misuse.
We keep personal data only as long as needed to provide the service, meet legal obligations, and resolve disputes.

section7.title: 7. Your choices
paragraphs: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data, subject to applicable laws.
You can also opt out of non-essential cookies through your browser settings or any cookie controls we provide.

section8.title: 8. Contact
paragraphs: For privacy questions or requests related to your data, please contact us using the email address or contact details listed on our website.

Intro.title: Terms, clearly stated.
Intro.lead: These Terms explain how Taly Jewelry and Taly Studio work, what you can expect from the service, and what we ask from you while using it.
lines: This is a short demo version for testing.
We will expand these Terms with full details before launch.

section1.title: 1. About the service
paragraphs: Taly Jewelry provides access to Taly Studio, a digital experience for generating jewellery concepts and stories.
Features may evolve over time as we improve the product.

section2.title: 2. Accounts
paragraphs: You may need an account to save creations and access certain features.
You are responsible for keeping your account credentials secure.

section3.title: 3. Acceptable use
paragraphs: Do not misuse the service or attempt to disrupt it.
Do not upload unlawful content or content that violates the rights of others.

section4.title: 4. Payments and subscriptions
paragraphs: Some features may require a subscription or purchase.
Plan details and pricing are shown on the Pricing page.

section5.title: 5. Contact
paragraphs: If you have questions about these Terms, contact us using the details on our website.

Intro.title: Cookies, without the noise.
Intro.lead: This page explains what cookies are, why we use them, and how you can manage your preferences on Taly Jewelry and Taly Studio.
Intro.statementTitle: How we use cookies in Taly Studio.
lines: We use essential cookies to keep the website working and to maintain basic sessions.
Where applicable, you can choose whether to allow non-essential cookies used for analytics or improvements.
This is a short demo version for testing. We will expand it with full details before launch.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
paragraphs: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website.
They help websites remember preferences, keep sessions active, and improve performance.

section2.title: 2. Cookies we may use
paragraphs: Essential cookies: required for core functionality, security, and basic navigation.
Preference cookies: used to remember settings such as language or UI preferences.
Analytics cookies: used to understand performance and improve the product (where enabled).

section3.title: 3. Managing your preferences
paragraphs: You can control cookies through your browser settings, including blocking or deleting cookies.
If you disable essential cookies, some parts of the website may not work correctly.

section4.title: 4. Updates to this policy
paragraphs: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time to reflect changes in the service or legal requirements.
When we make changes, we will update the “Last updated” date at the bottom of this page.

Intro.title: Answers, without the noise.
Intro.lead: Here are the most common questions about Taly Studio, accounts, and how the experience works.

item1.a: Taly Studio is a digital experience that generates jewellery concepts and narratives based on your inputs and preferences.

item2.q: Do I need an account to use it?
item2.a: You can explore some pages without an account, but saving creations and building a personal gallery requires signing in.

item3.q: What data do you need from me?
item3.a: At minimum, we need an email for your account. Optional profile details help personalise the experience and improve your results.

item4.q: Can I change my details later?
item4.a: Yes. You can update profile information and preferences anytime from your account settings.

item5.a: Use the Contact page to send a message. We typically reply within 1–2 business days.

Footer.note: Can’t find what you’re looking for? Reach out via the Contact page.

Hero.title: Support & Guidance
Hero.imageAlt: Taly Studio support and guidance hero background

Intro.title: A clear path from birth chart to talisman concept.
Intro.lead: This page explains how Taly Studio works, what you can do inside the app, and how to get help when you need it.

how.title: How Taly works
how.p1: Taly Studio uses AI to generate a jewellery concept based on your birth chart inputs (date of birth, birth time, birth place, and optional profile details such as gender).
how.p2: From these inputs, Taly creates a personalised narrative, highlights traits and themes, and proposes a jewellery direction that fits the person behind the chart.
how.freeLine: You can try Taly with 3 free creations. After that, you’ll need to choose one of our plans.

credits.title: Credits and generations
credits.p1: Each subscription plan includes a monthly credit allowance. Credits are used whenever you generate a new image inside Taly Studio.

bullets.b1: One image generation uses one credit.
bullets.b2: Credits renew based on your billing cycle.
bullets.b3: Your plan defines how many generations you can create each month.

madeReal.title: Bring your jewellery concept to life
madeReal.p1: If you want, you can ask our team to create the jewellery piece in the real world based on your generated concept.
madeReal.p2: This is a paid service and pricing depends on materials, complexity, and stone choices. To discuss details, reach out via

gallery.title: Save, revisit, and share
gallery.p1: Your account lets you build a personal library of concepts over time, so your journey stays consistent and easy to revisit.

bullets.b1: Save your favourite images to your personal gallery.
bullets.b2: Share your results on social media to show others what Taly can create.

Legal.note: For legal details about how we handle data and how the service works, please review the policies above.
